response.raw:
Here is my attempt at the task:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
To: John Smith, Attorney
From: [Assistant's Name], Senior Paralegal
Date: [Current Date]
Re: Preparation of Affidavits and Document Organization

This memo summarizes the work I have completed in preparing affidavits and other legal documents for upcoming cases, as well as organizing and maintaining our document management systems.

Affidavits and Legal Documents:
- Drafted affidavits for witnesses Jane Doe and Bob Johnson in the ABC Corp litigation matter
- Prepared legal correspondence to opposing counsel regarding upcoming depositions in XYZ, LLC v. Acme, Inc.
- Assisted in drafting interrogatory responses for the John Doe personal injury case
- Compiled exhibits and evidence to support motion for summary judgment in 123 Co. contract dispute

Document Management and Organization:
- Scanned, categorized and uploaded all incoming physical mail and discovery documents to our secure cloud-based filing system 
- Created new electronic case folders for recently opened matters
- Ran OCR on older scanned documents to enable full-text search capabilities
- Performed quarterly audit and archiving of closed case files, both in electronic and physical storage systems

Please let me know if you need any additional information or have questions about these projects. I'm happy to assist further with affidavit preparation and document management to support our caseload.
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
